Title: Remember the Cant
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Robin Veith (written for television by), Georgia Lee (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Jane, Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper
Plot: While Avasarala plays a dangerous game of politics, Holden and his crew are forced to turn on one another while held captive by the Martian Navy.
